CustomField.description: Created as a part of 2023 R4 enhancements (US-717). Entered upon case creation if the submitter has the award at the point of requesting an approval. Gets passed to the equivalent field on Opp when the case is Closed - Approved/Resolved. Only populated for non-USD opps.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Complete if award amount is in a currency other than USD.
CustomField.label: Originating Currency
